24f5f782-19e1-4bc0-9c02-c3300753ad3b: A Hellknight's {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are treated as {g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}good-aligned{/g} for the purpose of overcoming {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g}.
a25b63e0-7b6a-4393-b8ee-53c0c02150ef: A creature with the {g|Encyclopedia:Fast_Healing}fast healing{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}special ability{/g} regains {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} at an exceptional rate. Fast healing continues to function even if the creature is {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g} or has less than zero hit points, as long as it's alive. If the creature dies, the effects of fast healing end immediately.
ae38e326-cb19-4f69-af2c-b15dae89d70f:
A layer of jagged ice grows on any weapon you wield.
Benefit: Your melee weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d8{/g} per shard.
3eed5d77-a7ae-4430-b3ef-1e759c5cd995:
A localized snowstorm rages around you, which makes you a harder target to hit.
Benefit:  All {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made against you suffer a miss chance equal to 5% per shard. If you possess three shards, this chance is increased by an additional 5%.
75ce5127-7e3c-46f8-a90a-c3f5e5a4ce0e:
A portion of the shard's influence extends to your animal companion.
Benefit: Your animal companion gains a profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} equal to four times your number of shards, and all the damage it deals is turned into {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}unholy damage{/g}.
49f581ed-093f-48d1-80b5-5b125e161009:
A thin layer of ice grows all over your body, re-forming whenever it is shattered.
Benefit: Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, you gain a number of temporary {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} equal to three times your number of shards.
c6d11163-d594-4acb-b936-da7b5ff856e0: Add +2 to the Difficulty Class for all saving throws against spells from the Necromancy school of magic you cast.
b9d3a06a-20f0-49b8-995b-1ed61609ebd6:
All your vital organs are encased in ice.
Benefit: You become immune to sneak attacks and {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hits{/g} and gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/{g|Encyclopedia:Alignment}evil{/g} and DR 5/chaotic.
ffb62289-694d-470e-9619-85302aaa0ecb: Allows you to craft potions up to level 6 during {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}camping{/g}.
b922f4b4-f491-4abe-87c9-982bd63f036c:
As long as you keep fighting, the power of your {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} keeps growing.
Benefit: Every turn, as long as you make at least one melee attack, you gain a stacking +2 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} with melee weapons, up to a maximum of +10, that lasts until the end of combat.
94f61b70-77cb-4932-a339-dfadcbb1c240: At 1st rank and every odd mythic rank thereafter, select one new mythic ability.
73d63406-a783-4f88-8d11-53de60c3ba2a: At 1st rank of the character's mythic progression, they need to select their first ascension ability. This ability is usually closely tied to the source of the character's mythic powers. It does not determine the character's choice of an actual mythic path later, but the source of the powers and the mythic path are closely linked. The character must be aware of their connection to the source to select the ability linked to it.
d7bbb471-7c6f-43f0-b5f6-5ae640335612: Each time you deal {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with your ranged weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, or reduce the target to zero {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, you deal your weapon damage to all other enemies in 10ft radius.
cea2ad11-caa0-4c8b-b1a0-43039727291c: Every time you miss an enemy with a ranged weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, your aim improves, giving you a stacking +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on attacks against the same enemy up to the maximum of your mythic rank. Every successful hit lessens this bonus by 1.
da2777d4-0baf-4a1c-a907-db5bfd28bc33:
From now on, you are made of the Swarm. You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} of a swarm and immunity to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g}. You {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} increase by (4 plus your swarm {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g}). You gain immunity to most effects affecting a normal mortal body, such as poison, disease, paralysis and stun.
Additionally, while Swarm Form is active, all your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} deal additional (4 plus your swarm size) {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} and any opponent that attacks you in melee combat is dealt (4 plus your swarm size) {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d6{/g} of damage.
8d9f4539-ebc9-4095-884a-3142cef5c61d:
In a dire situation, you can instantly make your way to a companion in danger and get them back into combat.
Benefit: Three times per day, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} you can teleport to an ally who has less than 30 {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}. Until the end of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, your first {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} or ability is empowered and maximized, as though using the {g|FeatureEmpoweredSpell}Empower Spell{/g} and {g|FeatureMaximizeSpell}Maximize Spell{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g}.
b7b22ffc-222f-4990-b30a-50a4afcb60d2: Moving while mounted no longer provokes {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attacks of opportunity{/g} for you or your mount.
ae7518ef-05e3-4756-9262-33e1ab0d5105: Mythic Skill Focus — Use Magic Device
cd79436d-de5d-4569-b97c-a5b49f252e01:
Mythic characters gain mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} every even mythic rank. These feats can be selected only as part of mythic advancement, not as part of a character's normal advancement or in place of any other bonus feat.
Most mythic feats require a non-mythic feat as a prerequisite. These mythic feats enhance the benefits of their prerequisite feats, making them truly awe-inspiring. If a character doesn't possess any of the necessary prerequisite feats when she gains a mythic feat, she can wait to select a mythic feat until the next time she gains a mythic rank or level.
28208854-3ae7-4361-b883-36a3768e608d: Mythic heroes are set apart from their contemporaries, capable of amazing feats of courage in the face of overwhelming odds. In spite of this, they're still similar in many ways to other adventurers. They have hit points, an armor class, and saving throws — in fact, most of their statistics are comparable to non-mythic characters of an equal level. Where mythic characters differ is in the special mythic abilities. These abilities enhance mythic characters both in and out of battle, allowing them to take part in extraordinary, larger-than-life adventures.
1e751f13-bdcb-4772-84a3-259ed344fccf:
Not even {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g} can grant your opponents peace, for you compel their souls to rake and torture the living.
Benefit: Whenever you kill a living creature, if it leaves behind a body, its spirit, still bound to the flesh, reaches out and and starts tearing apart those of your foes who yet live. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, all enemies within 5 feet of the body take {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per shard. The soul continues to torture itself and others for a number of rounds equal to your number of shards.
2ae0cf69-4e38-4d45-86d4-dff0fd112e9d: Overwhelming thoughts about your own grand purpose cause you to lose focus. You suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects equal to -2 per shard. Furthermore, you are {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g} for the entire first {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} of combat.
d82b5475-2168-4fd5-b1fc-082cf834c501: Select one {g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}school of magic{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from your {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feats{/g} and mythic feats that apply to another school of magic, such as Spell Focus feat and School Mastery mythic feat, now apply to the chosen school of magic too.
8be79af8-6de6-4b14-968a-a56f3bcf9df6: Select one {g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}school of magic{/g}. All {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you cast that belong to this school have their {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} increased by 1.
805368ce-b972-4b3b-9166-6d33738f76dd:
Some people motivate their companions by their mere presence, while you learnt that pain is a much more potent motivator.
Benefit: Every time you {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} an ally, they gain a +2 mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and damage rolls, and a +1 mythic bonus on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. The bonuses last for a number {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to half your mythic rank.
11bff979-4976-4395-91f3-25d2f02f3624:
The Gold Dragon gains immunity to mind-affecting effects and {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 15 plus your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} and half your mythic rank.
If your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} is less than 15 plus mythic rank, you gain a bonus up to that number.
All {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills{/g} become class skills for you. If you have less ranks in a skill than your mythic rank, you gain a bonus up to that number.
If any of your attributes before modifiers is less than 18, you gain a bonus up to that number.
{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} to your highest {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} increases to +6.
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} now change their dice to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d8{/g}, if it was not d8 or greater. If it was d8 or greater, the spell instead plus one bonus to damage per die.
54348153-bd1a-4135-ac55-284c0814b69c:
The Gold Dragon gains immunity to poison, disease, fear, {g|ConditionConfusion}confusion{/g}, paralysis and sleep. He also gains resistance to all energies equal to (his {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} plus half his mythic rank).
If any of your {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} before modifiers is less than (5 + your mythic rank), you gain a bonus up to that number.
If any of your attributes before modifiers is less than 14, you gain a bonus up to that number.
Your highest {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} gets a +4 bonus.
All your {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}hit dice{/g} are now {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d12{/g}.
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} now change their dice to d6, if it was not d6 or greater. If it already was d6 or greater, instead the spell deals one additional point of damage per dice rolled.
All your weapons count as +5 weapons.
6a19d980-b1a8-48b5-b88d-671c0d3bf31b:
The Gold Dragon gains {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to cold, fire, electricity and acid, energy drain and negative energy. All your {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} is now {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g}.
Any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} dealing damage now change their dice to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d10{/g}, if it was not d10 or greater. If it was d10 or greater, the spell instead plus one {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to damage per die.
Bonus to your highest {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g} increases to +8.
6f58cf47-7062-43d7-b7ff-9c5d226383fa: The Gold Dragon is a mighty, almost omnipotent creature that possesses powers beyond all others. The Gold Dragon is the embodiment of goodness, hope, and redemption.
7f440b63-3a07-41fb-afd3-65d9963094e7: The Swarm has only one desire — to devour everyone and everything in its path. There are no friends or foes, enemies or allies, dear ones or despised ones — only food.
e4ff021e-1845-4f65-82a2-3dbcc775c6cd:
The aura of evil emanating from you precipitates your foe's demise.
Benefit: Whenever you use an ability or cast a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} with evil, chaos, hex, curse, or {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g} descriptor, the target gains one temporary negative level for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
efb066fc-8233-465b-bf48-f1238970f9bd:
The bigger they are, the easier they are to hit for your ranged weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on your attack rolls with ranged weapons, equal to the {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} the target receives from their {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} (if any).
80cd9b74-1e2b-4c6b-987f-f28e2bc892e3:
The cold radiating from you freezes your opponents and hinders their movements.
Benefit: Whenever you deal {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} to a creature, you coat it with a layer of snow. Any fire damage the creature suffers causes the uppermost layer to melt. If a creature accumulates 3 layers of snow, the snow turns to ice, binding and slowing the creature for 3 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}. This effect functions as a combination of the {g|SpellsEntangle}entangle{/g} and {g|SpellsSlow}slow{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
864953f3-bee6-4ec6-8991-18be137faf9f:
The creatures you summon gain a piece of your mythic power.
Benefit: Creatures summoned by you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} equal to half your mythic rank plus 1. Their {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} now ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} except N/-.
4c3ad8d1-902c-4c5c-86f2-3d970a15647d:
The icy crust that coats your body explodes into hundreds of icy needles when broken.
Benefit: Whenever you take {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} while under the effect of the Ice Coating shard boon, you deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per shard to all enemies within 10 feet of you.
1a33254e-a3d9-4c12-99bb-5752fde57d40:
The negative energy you channel spares no one.
Benefit: All {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you cast that deal {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}negative energy damage{/g} ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} and are altered as though using the {g|FeatureReachSpell}Reach Spell{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. Whenever you target an enemy who is {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immune{/g} to negative energy damage with a spell or ability that deals negative energy damage, that enemy becomes {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g} for a number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} equal to your number of shards.
c0f5f31f-b03a-4f94-a9f8-14a5068f7f4d:
The power of the shard lets you dominate the minds of weak-willed creatures.
Benefit: Three times per day, as a full-{g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}-{g|Encyclopedia:CA_Types}action{/g}, you can fill a creature's mind with conflicting thoughts and make it fight on your side as if it was your ally. The creature must be within 30 feet of you, and its {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} must not be greater than your level. It will {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of its ability for 3 rounds. After that the creature loses its will to fight and becomes {g|Encyclopedia:Helpless}helpless{/g}. If you fall {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g} while a creature is dominated this way, that creature becomes hostile once more.
2e6031a6-bf53-423b-b026-f76ff39874d7:
The sound of your blows is powerful enough to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} even without piercing through enemy defenses.
Benefit: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, when your {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g} misses the target, you deal ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} plus 1d6 per two mythic ranks) {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}sonic damage{/g} to all enemies in 10-feet radius.
23dfa904-24c6-4e06-b817-3daa96de83fd:
The tips of your projectiles are coated with ice that splinters on impact.
Benefit: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} an enemy with a ranged weapon from the bows, crossbows, or thrown fighter weapon group, your projectile splits into a number of fragments equal to 1 + your number of shards. Each fragment deals damage equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per shard to a random enemy within 10 feet of the target.
9b2d0759-711c-4812-9206-0279ed72d87a:
The wounds you inflict with your {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural attacks{/g} are anything but natural.
Benefit: Your natural {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} now ignore all {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} except N/-.
ba3f586e-1862-444c-a191-1904b0426adc:
The {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} you deal with your chosen weapon is truly awesome to behold.
Benefit: When using your chosen weapon, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on damage rolls. This stacks with the bonus from Weapon Specialization and Greater Weapon Specialization.
1664c077-aca2-49d0-be2d-db04edd95af7: This creature is now under other's domination.
75a78155-0251-4927-a907-4b5fbdc41755: Those you interact with are disturbed by the dark glint in your eyes and your predatory smile. You suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill checks{/g} when used for diplomacy equal to twice your number of shards.
1c451159-9bb3-47d2-a3f5-d188f3ae955f:
When focused, you become nearly impossible to strike.
Benefit: The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} from Dodge increases by 1. You also gain a dodge bonus to AC equal to your mythic rank against the first {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} that targets you in a {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
5c8485eb-9c3c-4af0-9534-627d9262adda:
When your shots hit the target, they do truly devastating {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
Benefit: When you use Deadly Aim, you gain a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on ranged damage rolls instead of +2. When your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} reaches +4, and every +4 thereafter, the bonus on ranged damage rolls increases by +3 rather than +2.
7ce925a1-0c42-4136-a35c-97b5542c853d: Whenever you cast a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, your next single {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack roll{/g} (and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage roll{/g}, if the attack hits) made with a weapon until end of the next {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank.
6dccd7cf-7c23-419a-a5c7-f881f03a09ce:
Whenever you curse your opponents, you weaken their defenses.
Benefit: Whenever you target an enemy with an ability or a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} with curse or hex {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g}, for the next {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} against that enemy are treated as if they were made with a cold iron magic weapon, and the enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} is reduced by an amount equal to your number of shards.
d9588daf-6ca6-4a4b-a812-563f9a98327c: Whenever you miss with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, the target still takes {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}. This damage cannot be increased by any other means.
007286c2-014c-42c5-aaa6-12d861fbd67d:
Whether you channel energy to {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heal{/g} or kill, it's especially potent.
Benefit: When you channel energy, the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} you heal or deal increases by a number of points equal to twice your {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
4633d827-4297-4a0d-a3dd-31d0d898dcda:
While fighting alongside allies, you cannot escape the fear of being stabbed in the back. You suffer a -1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} whenever you are within 5 feet of any ally. This penalty is doubled if you are within 5 feet of an ally who possesses a shard.
Furthermore, the constant pressure of combat threatens to unleash the chaotic power of the shard the moment you loosen your grip on it. Whenever you make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} or cast a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, there is a 10% chance that a blast of energy will erupt from your body and strike a random creature within 50 feet of you, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}4d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}unholy damage{/g}.
e3e9d2f0-0d76-42a1-ac9b-ed4a19e81a64: While using a light shield, you gain a shield {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throws{/g} equal to your shield's {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
41946f2e-48cb-46e2-b810-883a232f1f91: While using a tower shield, you masterfully block incoming {g|Encyclopedia:Physical_Damage}physical damage{/g}, gaining {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/-, where N is equal to half your shield's {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. This DR stacks with other sources of damage reduction.
78610044-9343-442a-899a-646cf5084e93: While wearing heavy armor, you add half your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to your {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} instead of your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} bonus. This bonus is not limited by the {g|Encyclopedia:Max_Dex_Bonus}maximum Dexterity bonus{/g} allowed by your armor.
d39b5aa8-2f50-47b9-9140-f7bb839f2c1e: While wearing heavy armor, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} N/-, where N is equal to half your armor's {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. This DR stacks with other sources of damage reduction.
9ab0a359-0463-4222-abed-8bb2dbf298e6: While wearing light armor, you add your mythic rank to the {g|Encyclopedia:Max_Dex_Bonus}maximum Dexterity bonus{/g} allowed by your armor, and all {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made against you suffer a 5% miss chance. At 4th, 7th, and 10th mythic ranks, this chance increases by 5%.
7ef4cdce-fd63-4f05-8fb2-0a0cb09dc1fe: While wearing light armor, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to your armor's {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}. This spell resistance stacks with other sources of spell resistance.
c70aaca9-4888-451c-8e7f-41bccd1143fe: While wearing medium armor, you add your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} modifier (minimum 0) to the {g|Encyclopedia:Max_Dex_Bonus}maximum Dexterity bonus{/g} allowed by your armor.
a828406c-34ea-4865-8a12-1ef4f8b5d919: While wearing medium armor, you gain an equipped armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} equal to half your armor's AC. Medium armor also no longer reduces your {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g}.
959b65c0-1ea8-4926-9443-4a50d5d633cf: While you are using a heavy shield, whenever an enemy hits you with a melee weapon without {g|Encyclopedia:Reach}reach{/g}, a {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapon{/g}, or an {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed strike{/g}, you deal {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}bludgeoning damage{/g} to that enemy equal to your shield's {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} + your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}.
cb2dfb82-1313-4eeb-8a10-29bbb1d21985:
With greater potency and frequency, your fists stun those who stand against you.
Benefit: The {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} of your Stunning Fist increases by half your mythic rank.
f730f5e3-4cc3-4200-98ea-8eab043d91d2:
With weapons in both hands, your deft strikes make you twice as deadly.
Benefit: Your {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} for fighting with two weapons are reduced by 2.
709d136b-4748-4cd4-9811-87ce760dec5e:
You are a beacon of hope for your comrades, and they perform better near you.
Benefit: Your allies within 50 feet of you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank plus 1 to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g}, their {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against mind-affecting effects, and their {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration checks{/g}.
f7fdc50c-1b3f-4797-9301-e12ef5afa9f3:
You are a master of the {g|SpellsHideousLaughter}hideous laughter{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
Benefit: When a creature fails a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throw{/g} against your hideous laughter spell, another random enemy within 30 feet of the target is affected by the same spell. This chain continues as long as targets continue to fail their saving throws.
aef2a5c5-1e21-44ae-87f2-a3175400b464:
You are a master of the {g|SpellsMageArmor}mage armor{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}.
Benefit: Whenever you cast mage armor on yourself, it gives an additional armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to your mythic rank.
8bfdd8dc-2325-4f03-8200-d336e052b223:
You are a paragon of your sorcerous bloodline.
Benefit: You immediately gain an ability from the 20th level of your bloodline.
fba2f251-cddc-4321-9a10-ef6fac6df295:
You are able to channel your mythic powers into invigorating and coordinating your allies.
Benefit: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can enter a state of Battle Meditation. While in this state, you are unable to move, lose your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and count as being {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g}. All allies in a 30-foot radius gain a morale bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against fear effects equal to one plus one per three mythic ranks.
5da32491-1f62-49be-ae73-8c51b6a36830:
You are always ready to unleash some extra {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}.
Benefit: Whenever you make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g}, you gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on the attack roll and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage roll{/g} equal to your mythic rank. The number of attacks of opportunity you can make each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} is increased by two.
49e3f708-195b-4c5c-8cbd-d90b535aec34:
You are imbued with mythic powers. Once per day you can activate this power to gain the following effects for 10 minutes:
You get a +1 mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} per 3 mythic ranks. Your attacks deal additional 10% {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}divine damage{/g}. All offensive {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you cast also deal additional 10% divine damage.
You get 10% fortification per 2 mythic ranks (as usual, this effect doesn't stack with fortification gained from other sources), {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 1/- per 2 mythic ranks, and {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} 2 per mythic rank against acid, fire, electricity, sonic and cold damage.
For every 3 mythic ranks, the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} against spells you cast is increased by 1. You gain +1 per 3 mythic ranks bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} made to overcome {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}.
All {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} spells you cast additionally heal 2 points of damage per mythic rank, and grant the target {g|Encyclopedia:Fast_Healing}Fast Healing{/g} equal to your mythic rank for 5 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
03cc2a03-7a8d-48e7-ba6d-6b3f23a159c4:
You become The Swarm.
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Intelligence}Intelligence{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Wisdom}Wisdom{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Charisma}Charisma{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} are increased by 4 plus your swarm {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g}, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 25 plus your swarm size, and you gain immunity to most harmful conditions.
You are also immune to {g|ConditionExhausted}exhaustion{/g} and {g|ConditionFatigued}fatigue{/g} effects. Your swarm form grants you a +10 profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Stealth}Stealth{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skills checks{/g} for Camouflage role and a +10 profane bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Perception}Perception{/g} skill {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} for Night Watch during {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}rest{/g} and movement on global map.
8a1cc826-e201-4e1d-a6d0-a45062592016:
You become a Host of the Great Swarm, which now lives inside your body. This symbiosis gives you {g|Encyclopedia:Fast_Healing}Fast Healing{/g} and additional {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} depending on the {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} of the swarm.
To increase the size of the swarm you need to devour other living beings.
34a23dc0-d7dc-41d6-8bd0-f42cfa8bd405: You become adept at fighting in armor fitted with sharp blades. While wearing heavy armor, whenever you hit a target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, you deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}slashing damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} + your armor's {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
ca65d8e1-dd3a-4bba-a206-45af0a68b53a: You become adept at fighting in armor fitted with spikes. While wearing medium armor, whenever you hit a target with a {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attack{/g}, you deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Type}piercing damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} + your armor's {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
ba6134d8-a72f-4974-9c1c-49222ec43291: You can assume a half-dragon form. You gain plus 2 to all attributes, and {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} by 6. You also increase by 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} category, and you gain golden wings. You also gain a dragon's bite {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}.
1b374d8c-59cf-4fd1-8a67-4aea49b1babf: You can assume the form of a Gold Dragon. You gain the following abilities: a +10 {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, a +8 size bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g}, a +8 form natural armor bonus, {g|Encyclopedia:Blindsense}Blindsense{/g} 60 feet. You also gain one bite ({g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d8{/g}), two claws (2d6), two wing {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} (1d8), and one tail slap attack (2d6).
f150acba-5fd8-4602-aff4-df104c41071e: You can cast boneshatter and plague storm spells.
4d896cbc-9094-4340-8e21-829ebfadb14c: You can cast poison breath, creeping doom, and cape of wasps spells.
d4ae75b6-802a-4f9e-bcc1-cbdcd6e88c5a:
You can cast the first {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} after an {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} if that spell is either of a 1st level or is at least two levels lower than the maximum level of spells you can cast.
Sorcerous Reflex does not work with the 0 level spells ({g|Encyclopedia:Cantrips_Orisons}cantrips{/g} and orisons).
5f52556f-1534-42b8-9ddf-1a9a169f6be6:
You can choose to pause amid the chaos of battle to let your fearsome majesty fill your allies with awe.
Benefit: As a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can exude an air of superiority that overwhelms those around you. While in this state, you are unable to move. All allies within 30 feet gain a profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} against fear effects equal to your number of shards.
6e75953a-81cb-460a-9c5e-1f30e944a289:
You can create a surge of mythic powers that frees you from all magical restraints.
Benefit: Three times per day you automatically dispel any effects that make you {g|ConditionFrightened}Frightened{/g}, {g|ConditionDaze}Dazed{/g}, {g|ConditionSickened}Sickened{/g}, {g|ConditionShaken}Shaken{/g}, {g|ConditionStaggered}Staggered{/g}, {g|ConditionNauseated}Nauseated{/g}, {g|ConditionStunned}Stunned{/g}, {g|ConditionParalyzed}Paralyzed{/g} or {g|ConditionConfusion}Confused{/g} whenever you become affected by any of those effects.
6b60966f-a26e-463a-bb07-bddddb48af7b: You can drink a potion as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
96b755e4-0573-42f6-af19-e3655df9fdf3:
You can fire many times each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} with amazing precision.
Benefit: When using Rapid Shot you ignore the {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}'s –2 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}.
0a81b6c8-ff9e-4ba9-b3dd-5000a8b552d9:
You can make your patron give you additional powers.
Benefit: This ability lets you select any Witch Hex, and grants you the ability to use the selected Hex. You lose the ability to use the Hex after choosing another Hex with this ability.
db1fbb2d-e684-43a1-a9d3-8a79a5b23761:
You can now use your mythic powers to fuel your metamagic abilities.
Benefit: Select one kind of metamagic. The {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} level cost for its use decreases by one (to a minimum of 0).
cba144ff-8a01-4783-828b-0cb91c6431b5:
You can quickly deter others with your martial mastery.
Benefit: While wielding the weapon with which you have Weapon Focus, you can use Dazzling Display as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g} with a –5 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on your {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill check{/g} to intimidate, as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} with a –10 penalty, or as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g} with a –20 penalty.
f07f2c0a-2fee-49b3-bdd9-5bf8526f3de5: You can select any {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, ignoring its prerequisites.
642dc374-14ba-429f-9931-455f48d8c887:
You can strike your foes with incredible force.
Benefit: Whenever you use Vital Strike, Improved Vital Strike, or Greater Vital Strike to multiply the number of dice you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} for {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}, you also multiply your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g}, weapon's enhancement bonus and other bonuses that would normally be multiplied on a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} by the same number.
Extra damage from sources that wouldn't normally be multiplied on a critical hit isn't multiplied by this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
34ec1491-fc82-4cb7-abc6-29dca9f356be:
You can use your mythic powers to change your kinetic blasts ever further.
Benefit: You can simultaneously apply two substance infusions to your kinetic blasts.
5b7c5866-fa54-485f-bfcc-f3c303b78c66: You don't die until your total number of negative {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} becomes equal to or greater than double your {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} score.
14a0df2f-8a0b-4c4b-97e9-a952dbc74396:
You feel a closer connection to your deity you serve.
Benefit: You gain one more domain, ignoring all domain prerequisites. This ability can only be taken by a cleric, inquisitor, or a hunter with the divine hunter archetype.
c4b5c087-1143-4544-bef7-4e90be1a42ca: You gain a +3 luck bonus to AC.
fc06c995-c6f6-4e6e-aa76-b09c399bf7f7: You gain a +3 luck bonus to attack.
874122e6-020d-4ff6-a3ae-5988faf9476c: You gain a +3 luck bonus to damage.
1d3039f4-86f6-4109-9d3f-c6a8c362f6df: You gain a +4 profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunity{/g} to cold.
bf8b254b-f1e7-4d3b-85e1-262cb782f3b8: You gain a bonus feat. You can take this mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} any number of times.
535251a7-722e-41e2-b3f9-7f0d7eb3efe0: You gain a bonus mythic ability. You can take this mythic {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g} multiple times.
fbc0ccb7-fa32-4087-8e0b-3b07d6cc4c67: You gain cold {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistance{/g} equal to 10 per shard and electricity, fire, and acid resistance equal to 3 per shard. In addition, you no longer affected by weather effects related to cold or wind.
c3f4d4e2-d7a7-4288-980d-6bcbf3d799e3:
You gain the ability to breath holy energy, attacking all enemies in a 50-foot cone, dealing ({g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} plus half mythic rank){g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}holy damage{/g}. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 10 + half your character level + your mythic rank + your highest ability modifier) halves the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
Any enemy hit by the breath {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} also gains a -1 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on all d20 rolls, while all enemies who failed the Reflex saving throw gain -2 penalty.
You can use your breath attack once every 1d4 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
0d77f384-eabd-41de-8537-05e8cd4a2970: You gain the ability to make your own clones using the swarm. They have all your abilities, but separate inventory. You can simultaneously have one clone per three points of your swarm size, but no more than one clone at 8 mythic rank, two clones at 9 mythic rank and five clones at 10 mythic rank.
020da064-fa9d-41e6-92e2-de0d90fd4e1a: You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g} equal to 11 + your {g|Encyclopedia:Character_Level}character level{/g} + your number of shards. In addition, you gain a profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g} equal to your number of shards.
449563ff-ef7b-48c0-8217-b9effc08147c: You get a +1 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to all {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}saving throws{/g}. You also get additional {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, their number equal to your mythic rank.
8cba0c43-0a8f-45f7-be84-0e27ee69850f: You have acquired another shard, and thus gain new powers.
3090ab92-856f-4caa-88ac-ba859d8a25d8:
You have found out that curses can be a blessing, and now you know how to use them.
Benefit: You gain an additional Oracle Curse, but it gives you no {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g}.
e391d03c-e9be-4b87-bfb1-7446da74a8cd:
You have grasped every conceivable property of ice and snow.
Benefit: You gain a profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attack{/g} rolls equal to your number of shards when casting {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} with cold {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g}. You also add the following spells to your list of spells known:
8ee5bdf6-9ae7-408b-a17a-a4959ad12a73: You have learned to make deep lunges with a shield around the battlefield in such a way that it deflects {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} made against allies. While using a buckler, all allies within 15 feet gain a shield {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} equal to your shield's AC.
da891b32-da79-4942-918c-b6266da4b20a:
You have learned to summon the weakest of Sithhud's minions and make them serve you.
Benefit: Three times per day, you can summon a number of icebound abrikandilus equal to twice your number of shards for 1 minute. Summoned monsters appear where you designate and act according to their {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} results. They {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} your opponents to the best of their ability.
f4aa86d7-eca9-4488-ae5a-3e9670782ffd:
You have mastered the art of applying elixirs at a distance.
Benefit: You can now apply your elixirs from a distance of 30 feet.
680dae39-39b6-4417-b10c-e375b58ff7f5: You have mastered the art of explosion. Whenever you use a bomb, you have a 50% chance of immediately recovering the reagents used to create the bomb. The {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} your bombs deal increases by one damage die of the same category.
3db626e1-1266-473c-ba79-4349af284f51:
You have mastered the element of cold.
Benefit: Any {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} you deal cannot be reduced or prevented by immunities or resistances. In addition, your abilities with cold {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g} deal additional unholy damage equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per shard (this does not apply to any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you cast).
52f6025e-54cb-4293-b1fe-64a22c87cb11:
You have mythical resilience and durability.
Benefit: Toughness provides you twice as many {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}. In addition, when you're below 0 hit points, you gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 10/epic.
3fd655d4-f24e-4a1e-8c28-8673b638268d: You have perfected the design of your light armor to fit your fighting style. While wearing light armor and wielding a melee weapon that can be used with Weapon Finesse, you gain an equipped armor {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} with this weapon equal to half your armor's {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g}.
4faafc48-7fc4-48b6-aafb-b5eed31f0659:
You have power over the bones of your enemies, both living and dead.
Benefit: Three times per day as a {g|Encyclopedia:Standard_Actions}standard action{/g}, you can curse an enemy within 30 feet who has a skeleton and 30 or fewer {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g}, causing their bones to start growing inside their body. The target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}unholy damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} for 3 rounds. If a target dies while under this effect, its growing bones transform into a skeletal abomination that fights alongside you for 6 rounds.
7fd40f28-5828-447a-9a73-b0ef88c2490a:
You have studied a way to increase the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you can cast per day.
Benefit: You can cast four more spells per day of 4th, 5th, and 6th levels each. This ability does not affect mythic spellbooks.
2b9b7f6e-536b-450f-9c06-585e9f23a7ef:
You leap into the fray with speed and confidence.
Benefit: The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Initiative}initiative{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} granted by Improved Initiative increases by an amount equal to your mythic rank.
e5e38c9a-8f40-46b0-bcf7-740449adf166:
You learned to use any shapes to the utmost.
Benefit: Whenever you become the target of a polymorph effect, all the physical {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability scores{/g} adjustments are modified by +4. Additionally, if you have the Wild Shape ability, you can use it any number of times per day.
5cd751e9-39ac-46fe-a0f7-7a3be9249b6e:
You learned to utilize the real power of the Shadows.
Benefit: Your Shadow {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} are 20% more real.
46f763cc-be68-4f03-baa6-a07dfc8caf9f:
You leave a mystical link with enemy {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spellcasters{/g} that lets you instantly move to them.
Benefit: Every time you are targeted by an enemy spell, you gain the ability to teleport to the spellcaster as a {g|Encyclopedia:Move_Action}move action{/g} for the next two {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}.
00551701-3a8c-4779-87f1-d87c3ba94748:
You mastered a certain element to a spectacular level.
Benefit: Choose one energy type (acid, cold, electricity, fire, sonic, or negative). The {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} of that energy type you deal can no longer be prevented or reduced by energy {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Resistance}resistances{/g} or energy {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Immunity}immunities{/g}. This bonus works on any damage you deal with the chosen energy type.
8c70ca32-0c34-4207-a711-fe9ca475d17a:
You mastery with this {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} is unmatched, even in difficult situations.
Benefit: You can always take 10 on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} with your choice of skill for Skill Focus if 10 on a {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} is enough for a successful skill check.
b7f23739-85ef-4c78-9f27-a088b4faed8e:
You moved closer to your deity and to the power it has over its divine domains.
Benefit: You can use the abilities of your domains as a {g|Encyclopedia:Swift_Action}swift action{/g}.
57b004b7-b5d5-4652-b188-148e8b3da8a3: You no longer suffer the {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalties{/g} of opposition {g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}schools of magic{/g}.
98fe84c1-63a8-4433-8615-102648bb8723: You no longer suffer your racial {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} to an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability_Scores}ability score{/g}. Only races with a penalty to an ability score can take this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
41291f8f-d882-4ecb-80c5-9c9fed4d71fb: You only suffer a -4 {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on your iterative {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g}, instead of -5 penalty.
5c1df85b-0d09-427c-abba-156525ae7b74:
You opened your mind and soul to learn the secrets of a second mystery.
Benefit: You gain a second Oracle Mystery.
557d84bd-58a2-406e-8ff2-426553ff1385:
You push foes around with amazing ease.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to bull rush, and to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when an opponent bull rushes you. These bonuses stack with those granted by non-mythic Greater Bull Rush.
Furthermore, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature that attempts to bull rush you, unless it also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
39772499-b1dc-41b3-b68a-dd9f9d5ced45:
You return all of the swarm into your body. You gain {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 5/- plus your swarm {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} and a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to natural armor equal to (4 plus your swarm size).
Using this ability cancels Swarm Infest and Swarm Feast.
d1bb93a7-9f2a-452a-ab74-609953b05d55:
You rob your opponents of what little life force they have left and give it to allies who are closest to {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}death{/g}.
Benefit: Once per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} when you deal {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}negative energy damage{/g}, your living ally with the fewest {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}heals{/g} a number of hit points equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per shard.
e81841c6-7313-457d-ad30-23de03c10096:
You send a part of your swarm to devour a corpse to increase the {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g} of your swarm.
The increase depends on the CR of the devoured corpse. When the amount of eaten enemies hits a threshold, you gain permanently increased {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} from other Swarm That Walks abilities.
4a547fdf-00d5-495f-9c47-8a3ed7acd53f:
You send a part of your swarm to infest an enemy. It makes the target {g|ConditionBlind}blind{/g} and deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}8d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Physical_Damage}physical damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. This {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} increases by 2d8 for each point of your swarm size. If the target dies while under this effect, it's automatically devoured.
When the ability ends (by activating Swarm Form ability), you are {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healed{/g} for the amount of damage you've dealt to the enemy with Swarm Infest.
Additionally, the target must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} = 15 + double your mythic rank) or become panicked.
Using this ability cancels Swarm Form and Swarm Feast.
2414ed79-7e83-4207-a3f0-d1ce55243755:
You use your mythic powers to fuel kineticist abilities.
Benefit: Gather power ability now reduces the burn cost of the kineticist blasts by one additional burn point.
d37efdce-9e60-4bb2-964f-491808d5aa7e:
You use your mythic powers to power your judgments.
Benefit: You can now use judgments any number of times per day.
6df46593-39e5-488e-8b02-d3d15181d9c3:
You're a master of down-and-dirty fighting.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to attempt a dirty trick, and to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when an opponent attempts to perform a dirty trick on you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Greater Dirty Trick.
Furthermore, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature that attempts a dirty trick {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Maneuvers}maneuver{/g} against you, unless it also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
38232375-7fc6-40d6-b354-0e0bb7472de3:
You're a master of using your shield for protection.
Benefit: Add your shield {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} and your shield's enhancement bonus to your {g|Encyclopedia:Touch_AC}touch AC{/g}.
b5bc6a9f-1c14-48c4-a221-0157939b7960:
You're a mythical master of one type of weapon.
Benefit: Double the {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonuses{/g} on your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} from Weapon Focus and Greater Weapon Focus.
acb43d0b-fd92-4a76-9a88-1937b4cdf997:
You're an expert with weapons that rely on your agility.
Benefit: When using Weapon Finesse, you may also use your {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} modifier instead of your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier on your {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g}.
2645e152-48eb-4e86-9f1d-a66eb61ab2cc:
You're expert at knocking your enemies' weapons away.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to disarm, and to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when an opponent tries to disarm you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Greater Disarm.
Furthermore, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature that attempts to disarm you, unless it also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
1bc61e1a-71e9-4991-ba7c-826525f877b6:
You're expert at knocking your foes down.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to trip, and to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when an opponent tries to trip you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Improved Trip.
Furthermore, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature that attempts to trip you, unless it also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
49f4ac41-2b13-4557-8382-b0497e83954d:
You've found a way to infuse your blood with even more power.
Benefit: You select a second bloodline, getting all its benefits.
aa8ef06f-9d1b-4cc3-aa39-658d974dc78f:
You've found a way to use your perception and knowledge to better defend yourself.
Benefit: Your Studied Target ability gives you a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against the target of your Studied Target ability equal to the bonus this ability gives you to {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g}.
40f24b83-77b2-45f3-a647-21723bb21bcb:
You've learned a way to fill your arcane reservoir to the maximum.
Benefit: You no longer gain only 3 + 1/2 arcanist level arcane points in the arcane reservoir after a {g|Encyclopedia:Rest}rest{/g}. Instead, you gain 3 + arcanist level points.
0af91986-2670-4af3-9019-914ac343a3ed:
You've learned a way to increase the number of uses of your Smite Chaos ability.
Benefit: You can use Smite Chaos a number of additional times per day equal to half your mythic rank.
2418fe51-209f-4511-8731-fc2fb22364d9:
You've learned a way to increase the number of uses of your Smite Evil ability.
Benefit: You can use Smite Evil a number of additional times per day equal to half your mythic rank.
7b1356c9-1380-4c28-b799-3fdab0bb608d:
You've learned a way to increase the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day you can use your Bane ability.
Benefit: The number of rounds per day you can use your Bane ability increases by a number of rounds equal to your mythic rank.
eacc8ae0-20f5-46d8-a0b7-3167cfcac3df:
You've learned a way to increase the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you can cast per day.
Benefit: You can cast four more spells per day of 1st, 2nd, and 3rd ranks each. This ability does not affect mythic spellbooks.
ed9c0a5a-e045-4b39-b294-d6b8b684a5aa:
You've learned a way to increase your Arcane Pool.
Benefit: Your Arcane Pool increases by a number of points equal to your mythic rank.
12773003-f4bc-49b3-9606-6461accc2f4e:
You've learned a way to increase your ki pool.
Benefit: Your ki pool increases by a number of points equal to your mythic rank.
40a86c19-4459-437c-891f-cd638468fa86:
You've learned a way to prolong the effects of your beneficial {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
Benefit: Effects of your spells on your allies that should last longer than an hour but shorter than 24 hours now last 24 hours.
36fea083-0c35-4f4f-8aac-c10fe93c2a95:
You've mastered a way to increase the number of {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} you can cast per day.
Benefit: You can cast four more spells per day of 7th, 8th, and 9th ranks each. This ability does not affect mythic spellbooks.
25344a83-4809-4706-b649-5c3e9f023bac:
You've mastered a way to prolong your beneficial {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g}.
Benefit: Effects of your spells on your allies that should last longer than 5 minutes but shorter than 24 hours now last 24 hours.
33037ebf-55ec-4a31-adb6-2b88b86eeb83:
You've mastered the art of raining elemental {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} on your foes, and found a way to empower them by combining different elements.
Benefit: Every time a spell you cast deals {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}energy damage{/g} to a creature, you apply an elemental mark to it. If during the next three {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} you deal energy {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to a marked target with a different type of energy, the target is dealt additional Divine damage. The damage is {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per mythic rank of your character.
c7f84344-a4d8-4327-9388-c3b31e21c28c:
Your accuracy with {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged attacks{/g} is unmatched at point-blank range.
Benefit: The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} granted by Point-Blank Shot increases to +2.
434e2bde-229e-411b-b49a-0ad843019480:
Your animal companion is just as mythic as you.
Benefit: Your animal companion gains a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to its {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g}, {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g}, and {g|Encyclopedia:Constitution}Constitution{/g} equal to half your mythic rank plus 1. Its {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} now ignore {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} except N/- and count as ghost touch weapons.
60c08be0-b678-452d-8f5e-fe3580e28b09:
Your charge carries the weight of your mythic powers.
Benefit: Your charge {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} deal additional Divine {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per mythic rank.
8c8ab70c-cebe-43de-9a66-f9d07d4057e4:
Your cold {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} are as effective as they can possibly be.
Benefit: All spells with cold {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g} cast by you are maximized, as though using the {g|FeatureMaximizeSpell}Maximize Spell{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. In addition, the {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DCs{/g} of those spells increases by 3.
c3f4a992-453e-4321-86ce-fe9c2d0fb370:
Your cold {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} are empowered.
Benefit: All spells with cold {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Descriptor}descriptor{/g} cast by you are empowered, as though using the {g|FeatureEmpoweredSpell}Empower Spell{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. In addition, those spells deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} equal to your number of shards per {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}dice{/g} rolled.
aa17a300-061b-4989-a893-db81c0023483:
Your defensive capabilities in combat are unmatched.
Benefit: Add half your mythic rank to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g}.
c112e32d-c820-4fea-b592-ec15ef2eec85:
Your fortitude is unmatched.
Benefit: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Fortitude saving throw{/g}, roll twice and take the higher result.
9b0eb562-e7a6-42e2-ae57-546743634da2:
Your growing powers let you speak to one more spirit.
Benefit: You gain one more Shaman Spirit.
1a040938-9183-4f3a-97ca-b2aa073c57b3:
Your healing is no longer affected by common limitations.
Benefit: Whenever you cast a cure wounds {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} or another {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} spell, it becomes reach as though using the {g|FeatureReachSpell}Reach Spell{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}. Also, the amount of {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} it now restores depends entirely on your {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} and disregards any limits in the original spell.
140b5c07-ba63-414b-bd75-435f096a874c:
Your icy stare can chill the blood in your opponent's veins.
Benefit: All enemies within 30 feet of you have their {g|Encyclopedia:Speed}speed{/g} reduced by 5 feet per shard and suffer a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throws{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack rolls{/g} equal to -1 per shard.
This boon has no effect on undead and constructs.
751aeb59-3d66-4844-9969-ad36d4a7c869:
Your inner fortitude is so strong that it lets you overcome most debilitating conditions.
Benefit: At any time you would become {g|ConditionParalyzed}paralyzed{/g}, you become {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g} instead. If you would become {g|ConditionNauseated}nauseated{/g}, you become {g|ConditionSickened}sickened{/g}, and you become {g|ConditionShaken}shaken{/g} instead of {g|ConditionFrightened}frightened{/g}.
0e69ac55-a195-488c-ba0a-7b1491aecb09:
Your magical specialties are particularly effective.
Benefit: Choose a {g|Encyclopedia:Magic_School}school of magic{/g} you already have Spell Focus in. The {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} to {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}save{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:DC}DCs{/g} provided by Spell Focus and Greater Spell Focus for that school increases by 1.
3b06c8cf-87a4-476e-9b2f-d47c2e55075d: Your main weapon becomes a Living Bane weapon.
a95b74dc-8e04-48ce-9dfe-d8ea89512ebe:
Your mighty smashing blows demolish armor.
Benefit: You gain a {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} equal to half your mythic rank on {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to sunder, and to your {g|Encyclopedia:CMD}CMD{/g} when an opponent tries to sunder an object used by you. These bonuses stack with those granted by Greater Sunder Armor.
Furthermore, you can make an {g|Encyclopedia:Attack_Of_Opportunity}attack of opportunity{/g} against any creature that attempts to sunder an armor used by you, unless it also has this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}.
c74b7b1e-8e28-47f9-baaf-0a1b616efd86:
Your mission is too important for you to fall in battle, and thus the shard grants you the strength to endure in the face of adversity.
Benefit: Once per day when your {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} would be reduced to 0 or less, your hit points are instead reduced to 1 and you gain a number of temporary hit points equal to 40 per shard. These temporary hit points last until the end of combat.
d80716a5-441f-45bd-b327-a8b81e84afd1:
Your mission is too important to fall in battle and your mythic powers let you endure unbelievable things.
Benefit: Once per day, when your {g|Encyclopedia:HP}HP{/g} drops low, you become unkillable. For two {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g}, you become immune to {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} that would make you {g|Encyclopedia:Injury_Death}unconscious{/g}.
54e923d2-4b69-4183-9bcf-e7ce5ef3be88:
Your music has become even more powerful and inspiring to your allies.
Benefit: All bonuses granted by your inspiring abilities are increased by 1 + 1 for every 3 mythic ranks above 1st.
For the purposes of this {g|Encyclopedia:Feat}feat{/g}, inspiring abilities are the following abilities of bards and skalds: Inspire Courage, Inspire Competence, Archaeologist's Luck, Inspire Ferocity, Inspire Tranquility, Inspired Rage, Insightful Contemplation.
3d25a712-d66e-4f45-a7ad-102827175a9d:
Your mythic magical power breaches your enemies' defenses.
Benefit: Add half your mythic rank to {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Check}checks{/g} to overcome {g|Encyclopedia:Spell_Resistance}spell resistance{/g}. If you have Greater {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}Spell{/g} Penetration, add your full mythic rank instead.
4517d79b-e178-4f89-90eb-cf0a6e6e13f5: Your mythic powers allow you to bypass {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}damage reduction{/g} N/Epic.
0b99dd3c-b478-4db7-a99b-a64f2dadac83:
Your mythic powers can negate any magic around you.
Benefit: Activating this ability grants you magic immunity and dispels any {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g} effects on you.
a59e0ffb-3d4a-4468-a327-5e7c2e6c14f2:
Your performances are unforgettable.
Benefit: Your bardic performance ability now works as if you were a bard of 6 levels higher.
3fc22bd4-52fe-4caa-8fd0-3a522ac50400: Your poisons and diseases ignore immunities.
c8f85a1a-9fc0-414f-83a1-814c5bf9f070:
Your projectiles are enchanted with cold that binds the opponent's limbs.
Benefit: Whenever you land a hit on an enemy with a ranged weapon from the bows, crossbows, or thrown fighter weapon group, you deal additional {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per shard. This effect can occur twice per {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. If that enemy's {g|Encyclopedia:Hit_Dice}Hit Dice{/g} are equal to or less than your level + your number of shards, that enemy is also frozen in place. While in this state, they cannot intentionally move by any means.
a2baae63-59bd-4ffa-b7eb-7c659ad29860:
Your rage knows neither limits nor bounds.
Benefit: The amount of Rage or Rampage abilities {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}rounds{/g} per day is no longer limited.
5f1b8357-9452-46de-aa1d-d16617114af3:
Your ranged weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} expose the enemy's vulnerable points.
Benefit: Every third hit with a ranged weapon against the same enemy deals additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per two mythic ranks divine {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
9ef18aaf-419d-47f2-8bf1-969a12db1d52:
Your reflexes are superhuman.
Benefit: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex saving throw{/g}, roll twice and take the higher result.
5be5e6af-211d-46c9-a340-e50b38015dc7: Your sneak attack deals +2d6 extra damage.
4aa5f43d-966d-437f-92d3-0bb1b75c943d: Your sneak attacks deal an additional {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
ae67277c-0b51-4817-b30f-558edec2723c:
Your strikes make cracks in the enemy existence, leaving weak points for your allies to strike.
Benefit: Every time you hit a target in melee combat, you leave a mark on it. Any ally {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacking{/g} the marked target deals additional Divine {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} equal to {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} per your mythic rank to the target, consuming the mark.
Note: Only one ally can leave a mark on a target at a time. Other allies with Leading Strike ability do not deal additional damage to a marked target.
c3da0e20-059c-476c-8384-720d8692b3d7:
Your swarm flies out of your body and starts attacking all enemies in a 50-foot radius. Every {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} all enemies in the area are dealt (4 plus your swarm {g|Encyclopedia:Size}size{/g}) {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}d6{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Physical_Damage}physical damage{/g}. If they die while in the area, they are automatically devoured.
Any ranged or ranged {g|Encyclopedia:TouchAttack}touch attacks{/g} against you have a 50% chance to miss.
Using this ability cancels Swarm Form and Swarm Infest.
f227d789-f3a6-44a5-a6a8-5f044a13b927:
Your will is incorruptible.
Benefit: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} a {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throw{/g}, roll twice and take the higher result.
6e17e278-89be-4eac-9390-f70814068982:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are charged with cold energies that restrain the enemy's movements.
Benefit: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} an enemy with a sneak attack, that enemy also takes {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:AbilityDamage}damage{/g} equal to your number of shards. In addition, for the next {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, any weapon damage you deal to that enemy is turned into {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g}.
a3433569-d4d7-484b-9b9d-3681c16a1495:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are now less affected by luck.
Benefit: You don't automatically miss when you {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}roll{/g} a 1 on an attack roll.
1c4bd4a6-e87a-4528-8fa0-e0eb0a3dd0ca:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are truly devastating.
Benefit: When you use Power Attack, you gain a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on melee {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} instead of +2. When your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} reaches +4 and every 4 points thereafter, the amount of bonus damage increases by +3 instead of +2.
This bonus to damage is increased to +5 if you are making an attack with a {g|Encyclopedia:Light_Weapon}two-handed{/g} weapon, a one-handed weapon using two hands, or a primary {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapon{/g} that adds 1.5 times your {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} modifier on damage rolls.
c2ead968-9515-4a6c-8c53-3199d9087909:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attacks{/g} are truly vicious.
Benefit: When you use Piranha Strike, you gain a +3 {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage rolls{/g} instead of +2. When your {g|Encyclopedia:BAB}base attack bonus{/g} reaches +4, and every +4 thereafter, the bonus on damage rolls increases by +3 rather than +2.
0d428b26-5986-4ce0-bf38-b67a6a3d81b6:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical{/g} strikes with your chosen weapon are deadlier than most.
Benefit: Your critical multiplier with your chosen weapon is increased by 1.
c2e75056-e743-40be-8cc7-39f23da7aaae:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:NaturalAttack}natural weapons{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed strikes{/g} leave ever-growing ice crystals in the enemy's wounds.
Benefit: Whenever you {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} a target with a natural weapon or an unarmed strike, you leave a bleeding wound on its body. Each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}, the target takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d6{/g} bleed damage per shard and 1d6 {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}cold damage{/g} per shard. The ice crystals can be removed with any magical {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g}.
a8fb3700-b497-48b8-bc16-424fb1f7cf86:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:RangedAttack}ranged weapon attacks{/g} are dangerous enough for the enemy to forget about melee threats.
Benefit: If you hit an enemy with a ranged weapon {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g}, they receive a {g|Encyclopedia:Penalty}penalty{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} against {g|Encyclopedia:MeleeAttack}melee attacks{/g} equal to half your mythic rank for 1 {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}.
aab3ebd4-9c62-41b6-afa3-9892a846460b:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:Skills}skill{/g} with your favored weapon can frighten enemies.
Benefit: While wielding the weapon in which you have Weapon Focus, you can perform a bewildering show of prowess as a {g|Encyclopedia:Full_Round_Action}full-round action{/g}. Make a {g|Encyclopedia:Persuasion}Persuasion{/g} (intimidate) {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} to demoralize all foes within 30 feet who can see your display.
3cc514da-620e-412f-857c-b27a87d4a08e:
Your {g|Encyclopedia:UnarmedAttack}unarmed strikes{/g} are more powerful than others.
Benefit: You can add half your mythic rank to your {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} with unarmed strikes.
